Planning 51  Select the best subsystem: If multiple disk storage subsystems in your data center are accessible to z/VM, carefully consider which of these disk storage subsystems you select for the z/VM paging volumes. Disk storage subsystem controllers of different speeds, cache sizes, capabilities, and existing loads are all considerations when you decide where to place paging volumes.  Performance matters: Within a certain disk storage subsystem controller, volume performance is sensitive to how the volumes are placed.
